member.name: T:VM_Middleware.MainMiddleware
member.summary: The middleware to control the Vending Machine. Instantiate is not required. Use Instance instead.

member.name: P:VM_Middleware.MainMiddleware.IsInitialize
member.summary: Return true if initialize successfuly, else return false.

member.name: F:VM_Middleware.MainMiddleware.Instance
member.summary: The static instance for the class.

member.name: M:VM_Middleware.MainMiddleware.Initialize
member.summary: Please initialize before perform any other methods. Initialize once will be sufficient.

member.name: M:VM_Middleware.MainMiddleware.DropItem
member.exception: Thrown when there is no item available.

member.name: M:VM_Middleware.MainMiddleware.GetTotalItemAvailable
member.summary: Get the total number of the item available.
member.returns: Integer of the total number of items available.
